teaser: Corporations have been moving away from providing retiree health benefits for years. Now IBM joins those choosing to pay retirees an annual lump sum they can use to buy insurance through a private exchange. How much can companies save by sending people to private exchanges?
byline: Eve Troeh, Audrey Quinn, Queena Kim, Rob Schmitz, Kai Ryssdal, Adrienne Hill, Stacey Vanek Smith and Kim Adams
title: Marketplace for Monday, September 9, 2013
description: Corporations have been moving away from providing retiree health benefits for years. Now IBM joins those choosing to pay retirees an annual lump sum they can use to buy insurance through a private exchange. How much can companies save by sending people to private exchanges?
